name: 運動貼紮與臨床實作
restrict: ◎第一階段限 運動傷害防護學程◎限運動傷害防護學程選修
goals: 了解運動貼紮的適用時機、操作時應注意事項、如何避免不當貼紮
有能力結合以修習過的運動傷害防護學課程內容，了解各部位常見運動傷害之運動貼紮方式
精熟各部位常見傷害之運動貼紮與包紮技術
syllabus:
*   Week 1: Introductions; Syllabus; Taping/Wrapping/Bracing/Padding Basics and Anatomy Review
*   Week 2: Taping/Wrapping/Bracing/Padding Basics and Anatomy Review _– Lab: Basic Skills_
*   Week 3: Foot Anatomy _– Lab: Foot Taping, Wrapping, Padding, Bracing_
*   Week 4: Foot & Lower Leg Anatomy _– Lab: Foot and Lower Leg Taping, Wrapping, Padding, Bracing_
*   Week 5: Ankle & Lower Leg Anatomy _– Lab: Ankle and Lower Leg Taping, Wrapping, Padding, Bracing_
*   Week 6: _Lab: Ankle and Lower Leg Taping, Wrapping, Padding, Bracing_
*   Week 7: Knee Anatomy _– Lab: Knee Taping, Wrapping, Padding, Bracing_
*   Week 8: Knee Anatomy _– Lab: Knee Taping, Wrapping, Padding, Bracing_
*   **Week 9: Midterm Practical Exam**
*   **Week 10: Midterm Practical Exam**
*   Week 11: Thigh, Hip, Groin, Pelvis Anatomy _– Lab: Thigh, Hip, Groin, Pelvis Taping, Wrapping, Padding, Bracing_
*   Week 12: Shoulder Complex and Trunk Anatomy _– Lab: Shoulder Complex and Trunk Taping, Wrapping, Padding, Bracing_
*   Week 13: Forearm and Elbow Anatomy _– Lab: Forearm and Elbow Taping, Wrapping, Padding, Bracing_
*   Week 14: Wrist, Hand, Fingers Anatomy _– Lab: Wrist, Hand, Fingers Taping, Wrapping, Padding, Bracing_
*   Week 15: **Final Practical Exam**
*   Week 16: **Final Practical Exam** **＆** **Clinical Observation Assignment**

methodologies.note: The instructor reviews basic anatomy and sports injuries of relevant structures and demonstrates taping and bracing techniques.

Incorporate sport-related scenario-based discussion to assist students in applying higher-level thinking and problem-solving skills regarding the use and application of taping, wrapping, bracing, and padding procedures.

Incorporate sport-related scenario-based discussion to assist students in applying higher-level thinking and problem-solving skills regarding the use and application of taping, wrapping, bracing, and padding procedures.
Students peer with each other and practice techniques as a group to promote collaboration. Peer-review tasks are built into lab worksheets to facilitate peer learning.
Students are introduced to various techniques each week. Weekly lab worksheets and learning tasks are assigned.
Sport related scenario and taping and bracing videos

prerequisite: ◎First phase Exclusive for students within The Program of Injury Prevention and Athletic Training◎限The Program of Injur
